titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, with respect to release of those hospitalized following a verdict of not guilty by reason of insanity.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 4/23/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit any person hospitalized following a verdict of not guilty by reason of insanity from being released from the grounds of the facility in which such person is hospitalized, unless accompanied by a Federal law enforcement officer.
